parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Visual Studio Team Services account.

BatchDeprecateData.description: Data required to deprecate multiple package versions. Pass this while performing NpmBatchOperationTypes.Deprecate batch operation.

message.description: Deprecate message that will be added to packages

BatchOperationData.description: Do not attempt to use this type to create a new BatchOperationData. This type does not contain sufficient fields to create a new batch operation data.

JsonPatchOperation.description: The JSON model for a JSON Patch operation

from.description: The path to copy from for the Move/Copy operation.

value.description: The value for the operation. This is either a primitive or a JToken.

MinimalPackageDetails.description: Minimal package details required to identify a package within a protocol.

NpmPackagesBatchRequest.description: Request for batch operation on npm packages

data.description: Data required to perform the operation. This is optional based on type of operation. Use BatchPromoteData if performing a promote operation.

operation.description: Type of operation that needs to be performed on packages.

packages.description: The packages onto which the operation will be performed.

deprecateMessage.description: Deprecated message, if any, for the package

name.description: The display name of the package

unpublishedDate.description: If and when the package was deleted

deprecateMessage.description: Indicates the deprecate message of a package version

views.description: The view to which the package version will be added

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.  Example: `{ self: { href: "http://localhost:8080/tfs/DefaultCollection/_apis/wit/workItems/1" } }`

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '4.1-preview' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.packaging: Grants the ability to read feeds and packages.
scopes.vso.packaging_manage: Grants the ability to create, read, update, and delete feeds and packages.
scopes.vso.packaging_write: Grants the ability to create and read feeds and packages.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
